website_summaries.verdict: This flute's tone quality makes students want to play and those around them want to listen.
cons: May not hold notes well in the lower register

customer_reviews.title: Good flute - no warranty
customer_reviews.text: Nice flute -- however when i went to register for product warranty -- Amazon is not an authorized dealer and as such, Gemeinhardt wont warranty the product. Its a big disappointment and while it is brand new right now and probably not necessary, i am sure down the road it is possible it may be needed. If there was a warranty i wouldve given 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Netta

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat this Amazon deal!
customer_reviews.text: Great deal on the same flute that our schools push us to rent from a local music company. Only renting to own through them you get a used flute and end up paying $930!!!! This is 100% authentic. We received it in a factory sealed box from gemeinhardt. It came with a protective hard case, a battery powered tuner and a cleaning tool. Can't beat this Amazon deal!
customer_reviews.author: big red

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.text: We've ordered two flutes in the past month. One was defective (gasket dislodged from one of the keys) and the second one was previously used - not brand new! It had scuff marks all over it and the airway was dirty! Unfortunately we just learned that you can only buy genuine Gemeinhardt flutes from an authorized dealer. On the Gemeinhardt site Amazon is listed as unauthorized dealer. Beware!
customer_reviews.author: fernando l.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect flute for beginners and intermediate players
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this flute for my middle-school child who has been practicing flute for the last 2 years. She previously had been using an Etude flute, which is a great beginner flute, however, was having some issues holding certain notes due to wear and tear. Bottom line, my child needed something a step up, and this flute was not only affordable, but was absolutely perfect, right out of the box. Very professionally made, actual cork, and beautiful sounding notes. My child's music teacher at school is very happy with the selection and so far so good, a month into use. The flute comes with a very nice carrying case and registrations paperwork and a fair warranty. Cleaning kit sold separately.
customer_reviews.author: John Huff

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: It was good that I purchased this instead of renting it. My friend rented it from a local music store for a couple of years and later purchased. She ended up paying triple more than what I paid to purchase this. My kid has been playing this for about a year and a half. This still looks good and there was no problem so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Experienced flute teacher said it's a great flute and great deal.
customer_reviews.text: Went to music store to buy flute. They wanted to charge more than $600 for this and similar brands. Checked this on Amazon found this in used-like new condition for $280. Indeed, it looked new when it arrived. Daughter's teacher is pro musician whose been teaching lessons for 20+ years. She was amazed at the quality of this instrument and said we got an amazing deal.
customer_reviews.author: V Ember

customer_reviews.title: The best buy!
customer_reviews.text: "This is a great flute, excellent tone, quality pads, plating, etc...." according to my wife's teacher, who teaches flute and music at Georgia Southwestern University. She had recommended this flute after we purchase another flute earlier that was defective and cheaper. Amazon quickly handled refunding my purchase price and paid for returning without knowing I would be purchasing another flute from them. I love Amazon Customer Service! We are very impressed with the quality of the flute and my wife loves it. A very satisfied customer and one who recommends this product highly. Thanks. Ron
customer_reviews.author: Ron Gregory

customer_reviews.title: No Warranty
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint so far is that when I registered the product with Gemeinhardt for the warranty I was told they will not honor it because it was not purchased through one of their authorized distributors,
customer_reviews.author: Dan & Susan Woods

customer_reviews.title: Gemeinhardt Flute
customer_reviews.text: I bought this flute in October and have really enjoyed playing it. Great sound quality, great for a beginner or someone who hasn't played in many years. All around great flute!
customer_reviews.author: K. Higgins

customer_reviews.title: Excellent flute
customer_reviews.text: works great and good price. Please note there are different types of flute based on the number of holes and the button levers and the caps having holes or not etc.. take advice of your music teacher what to look for.
customer_reviews.author: sri

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: After one week, the flute was in stains. Looked like I’ve used it for years, very bad quality.
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my daughter.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is starting out in band music (she also plays the piano). I was looking for a reasonably priced starter flute for her that had a good name and reputation. The school is pushing a "rent to own" program and I cannot understand why anyone would want to pay $300 for a year of rentals and end up not owning the flute unless they fork over another pile of change. Was a no brainer purchasing this for her because I figured it would be able to easily resell should she decide she doesn't like it (something you cannot do if you rent). So far, she loves it! ;)
customer_reviews.author: GrinningShark

customer_reviews.title: arrived quickly and in excellent condition
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this as a Christmas present for my wife. It arrived quickly and the pads and body - everything was in excellent condition. My wife was delighted with it. It sounds beautiful, too.
customer_reviews.author: John H Colgren

customer_reviews.title: Missing Flute Piece
customer_reviews.text: Flute showed up missing an entire section from it! So much for quality control. We have returned it, and it’s taking weeks to get a replacement. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: There was a 5 payment promotion when I got this. It is okay, but I upgraded to the engraved Glory open hole flute that is less than half the price....
customer_reviews.author: Riaz Bacchus

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: This instrument was not pur together properly. My daughter's teacher had to send it to be fixed within 2 months of having it. We had to get new screws, washers and pads. Customer service wouldn't help me replace it and I couldn't wait because my daughter's grade depends on her having an instrument. Plan on spending another $75-$100 if you purchase this flute.
customer_reviews.author: Tina L. Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Bad shipping/packaging, cheaped out on tape
customer_reviews.text: Bad shipping/packaging, cheaped out on tape. Upon arrival at my door, the outer box was opened and the innerbox for the actual flute was opened too. The outerbox was barely taped. Checked the contents and they seem to be fine?
customer_reviews.author: Verdict442

customer_reviews.title: Not the real thing
customer_reviews.text: While this is a suitable beginning instrument for beginning, it is a knock off made in China.
customer_reviews.author: Rustynet

customer_reviews.title: Better than renting.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 11 year old. The school had a company that you could rent from for 35$ a month and it was a Yamaha. At the end of the school year you could purchase the Flute for 1000$ minus what you spent in rental fees (around 350$) I would rather just buy a flute. They do not lose their value and my daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amy J

customer_reviews.title: Good flute, good price
customer_reviews.text: My daughter's very pleased with her new flute. We've owned it for a month now. At first, when I would ask for her thoughts about it (compare it to your old one, I'd say), she would say it was good. I asked again today and she went into detail about how she's happy with the richer tone that she's getting out of this one. When comparing this to her old Gemeinhardt 2SP and her friend's Armstrong (which SEEMED to be the best quality of the 3), the new one wins, hands down! I'm glad to have found it here on Amazon for half the cost of the local music store's price!
customer_reviews.author: Raina

customer_reviews.title: Flute sounds good
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter. She has been very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph P

customer_reviews.title: The notes above A6 do not work
customer_reviews.text: Please see in the above. I called Gemeihardt help for my new 5-year warrantied flute but no one at the store had replied my calls.
customer_reviews.author: Echoecho

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Student Flute
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 11 year old daughter; she is really pleased with it. It has a nice tone and she fond it to be easy to play. The quality of the flute was obvious. My daughter's music teacher had recommended the Gemeinhardt for it's quality and value; it definitely was what the music teacher said it was and at half the price of a Yamaha student flute.
customer_reviews.author: HankW

customer_reviews.title: Gemeinhardt 2SP Silver Plated Flute Outfit
customer_reviews.text: My daughter's school had contracted with a instrument rental company to rent insturments for students in the school band but the cost of the rental was more than the purchase price from here. The rental company would have provided the same instrument, only used by who knows whom. So my daughter now has a brand new instrument and is slowly learning how to play it.
customer_reviews.author: Bronx Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality flute
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this new flute and it came from Victor Lintz music store in MD thru Amazon. The price was amazing and although my daughter's music teacher warned us about buying on-line, we did it anyways after pricing used flutes in our area. We got a brand new, "no flaws" flute in a nice black case. We had it checked out at the music store and the owner nodded in disbelief that we'd gotten it at such a great price ($269 plus postage). Don't be scared about ordering on line. Lintz does have a 100% rating.
customer_reviews.author: Geordie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the price and quality of this flute. Excellent beginning flute for certain. Should last all the way through school band.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy EdwardsTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Okay for a while
customer_reviews.text: After one year of careful use, a piece (the B-flat key) broke off for no good reason. It was okay for the year, but not worth 500 dollars. Expect more for that much money.
customer_reviews.author: L.Gaglia

customer_reviews.title: Nice Starter Flute!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. We have t played it yet. I I'll amend my review on that later. I did want to say it comes with a hard case which is nice. Although, the cleaning rod is plastic so I'll replace that with a metal one and no cleaning cloth was included.
customer_reviews.author: Heather M. Setka

customer_reviews.title: This was the one
customer_reviews.text: Not sure which type of flute to order for my nine year old (I'm not a flute player myself), I went with this one. She loved it. She was able to play simple songs in one breath (unlike her old, used one we had purchased her before this one).
customer_reviews.author: Justonemore

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great flute!!! would strongly recommend it to any child learning to play this instrument!
customer_reviews.author: Katerina L.

customer_reviews.title: This is her first year in band and she absolutely believes that she has the best flute in her class(and so do I)
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my niece and she loves it! This is her first year in band and she absolutely believes that she has the best flute in her class(and so do I)!! I am so happy to see how excited she is about it and how eager she is to learn how to play it,and I know that she will learn quickly. I couldn't be more satisfied. It's an excellent product at an excellent price!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good flute, bad inventory
customer_reviews.text: There is a scratch on Eb key.. and all the cork have dark dots on them look like molds.. There are also black dirts inside the flute. However, the flute sounds really well. I think they did not do a good job checking product quality before shipping it. However, the flute itself is nice.
customer_reviews.author: gbbt

customer_reviews.title: So far happy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 10 year old daughter since her band teacher recommend this brand. So far she likes it. I guess it's too early to make any useful comment.
customer_reviews.author: PG

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter love the flute. She is using it for school. Sounds great.
customer_reviews.author: Madonna Lowry

customer_reviews.title: Great Flute
customer_reviews.text: I got this flute for my daughter. I got it used, so I had to have some minor repairs done to it where the padding was worn. She's used it for 8th and 9th grade marching and concert band.
customer_reviews.author: Kane

customer_reviews.title: Great Flute!
customer_reviews.text: This seller promptly sent the flute. My son really likes this flute for band. He states that it sounds really good, and I agree.
customer_reviews.author: K. Adrian

customer_reviews.title: My daughter says it’s better than the one we have been renting
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this flute after returning one from another company that was $40 dollars cheaper. My daughter says it’s better than the one we have been renting. This is a great product so far.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: great product,description and customer service
customer_reviews.text: beautiful flute. arrived exactly as described. I would buy from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: R Myers

customer_reviews.title: exactly what I ordered. The description was exact.
customer_reviews.text: exactly what I ordered. The description was exact. Works well
customer_reviews.author: Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: High quality Beginner Flute
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality beginner flute. My son's 5th and 6th grade band uses this flute.
customer_reviews.author: Private

customer_reviews.title: Verry happy
customer_reviews.text: Great item just as seller described. Very quick on shipping! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Lanora Bousfield

customer_reviews.title: Great price and quality
customer_reviews.text: Brand new, perfect condition, and great price. No problems at all.
customer_reviews.author: Dana L. Potter

customer_reviews.title: Great quality flute!
customer_reviews.text: This Gemeinhardt flute is perfect for my daughter who just started band. Highly recommend purchasing this from Amazon. We saved over half from what they were selling the same flute for locally. A music stand, cleaning kit and music note canvas came with it. We couldn't be happier with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: fornat

customer_reviews.title: Meet expectations
customer_reviews.text: Band director was very pleased with our purchase. As a flutist and Gemeinhardt owner herself, that made us feel confident.
customer_reviews.author: vpurinton

customer_reviews.title: Great Flute for a Nice Price
customer_reviews.text: Refurbished flute by a true expert. I bought this for my daughter after her old flute was stolen and she absolutely loves it.
customer_reviews.author: David Chesher

customer_reviews.title: Exactly the same Student flute we rented from school's Music store (Marshall's Music)
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly the same flute as my child was renting from the school's music store (Marshall Music). She is very happy with it and is learning how to play. Owning made more sense to us than the rent to own deal through Marshalls as it will save about 60% of the rent to own price. It is brand new with warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Barry - MI

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy with our purchase...great flute for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Tim Buckmaster

customer_reviews.title: Great Flute for beginner !!
customer_reviews.text: I am an adult beginner. I knew the brand Gemeinhardt from a music instrument store. They strongly recommended student flute of Gemeinhardt and Jupiter. But normally, a student flute of these two brand costs $500-600 after discount. I was excited when I found this one with such low price (of course, it may not be the same model they showed me in the store.) It is so beautiful,and comes with a three year warranty. I asked my friend who had been playing flute for many many years to try it for me. She said this flute was excellent. I strongly recommended this one!
customer_reviews.author: L. Meng

customer_reviews.title: Apparently a good flute!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this flute as a replacement for my 12 year old granddaughter's. It looks very nice and she loves it. She says it plays great. Her band instructor was pleased with it as well. He said he was glad I was willing to spend the money for a good flute instead of one of the cheap ones that often are bought online.
customer_reviews.author: BJ

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, few scratches, but it was mentioned before purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Meow1234

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: The flute works great!! Comes and looks in perfect condition. Easy to handle and very lightweight
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LIKE NEW & WORTH IT!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter's band teacher wanted me to purchase a brand new Gemeinhardt through the school for$750. This is a great $150 investment in my daughter's future.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya T.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product quality was what I expected, it made it undamaged in a timely manner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: I was told when I had someone check this out that this is the most requested flute by band teachers. Great find on my part!!
customer_reviews.author: hchi

customer_reviews.title: My granddaughter is so happy. It sounds so much better than her rental
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter is so happy. It sounds so much better than her rental!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Grubert

customer_reviews.title: The replacement flute works fine. The case left some to be desired
customer_reviews.text: There was initially a problem with the flute, but the seller was very gracious and replaced it. The replacement flute works fine. The case left some to be desired, but all in all I am satisfied to have a working flute.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Heglund

customer_reviews.title: Fine flute
customer_reviews.text: The flute was aparently not well cared for, however it is a quality instrument. We had it professionally examined, cleaned appropriately. Shipping was quick and the price was fair. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Lancasterescu

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Control
customer_reviews.text: Flute non-functional from the start. One pedal not sealing properly renders the flute unusable. I suggest better quality control. I have returned the flute and expect the replacement to be flawless. Stand by.
customer_reviews.author: steve barker

customer_reviews.title: Nice flute
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful silver finish. Nice and soft key actions. Excellent built quality. Works great! It was not cheap, but the price was right for the quality and fair.
customer_reviews.author: hx1

customer_reviews.title: i found a flute
customer_reviews.text: I bought a flute for my daughter beacase she is band.When i bought it the flute had no scraches it played so good i thought it would be like i spend my money for no reason but actually it so good now she has a flute.
customer_reviews.author: elvia

customer_reviews.title: Great Flute!!!
customer_reviews.text: This flute has wonderful, warm tones and is good for the student or the seasoned user. Made by Gemeinhardt, one of the leading flute makers in the US, it is beautiful in appearance, too.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa  M. Des Rosiers

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful flute. just as described, Received it in two days! Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Daughter is happy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for our daughter. She loves it Comes w/ a warranty as well, which is nice to see.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Blickhan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome flute
customer_reviews.text: Really love my flute. The person I bought this from made sure I got it in time for my high school reunion. It got there the day before. Great buying experience.
customer_reviews.author: Mkeith

customer_reviews.title: The flute is fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Derivery was very fast. The flute was in great conditions. Plays just beautifully and smooth, looks like new. I'm very happy with it, love the warm sound.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Plays Great. Great Price. Was able to start taking classes again. My instructor said I got a great deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Melina L. Miller

customer_reviews.title: A good buy for a great brand.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this beginner flute for my son because it was priced at a great price. The rental flute we originally signed up for would have costed me over $800. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Thai Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great Student Flute
customer_reviews.text: We bought this flute for our daughter who started band this year. She loves it!The flute is easy to break down and clean and we have no regrets.
customer_reviews.author: hookemmark

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Nicely packed. Items came in one day before they were supposed to be. I received a gift afterwards which is really nice!
customer_reviews.author: Sol

customer_reviews.title: Flute
customer_reviews.text: This was a used flute purchased for a beginning player. We were satisfied with the price and condition of the instrument for a beginner. Gemeinhardt - the brand name was helpful in purchasing. I taught band for 12 years and felt the product was acceptable for a granddaughter.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Hackbarth

customer_reviews.title: I love it...
customer_reviews.text: the flute sounds good and I look forward to making my flute play a song. It also is a very pretty flute.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Hart

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product.
customer_reviews.text: This flute is really good. All the key holes are plugged so you don't have to worry about buying extras or anything! It has a really good tone quality also. It only comes with its case and a tuning stick. In the picture it shows a carrying bag for it but it didn't come with it. But over all, it's a great flute for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Percy Victoria

customer_reviews.title: The tone is beautiful. I find it difficult to go from upper ...
customer_reviews.text: The flute arrived clean and shiny! I haven't played in 20 years so I was very excited to get it. The tone is beautiful. I find it difficult to go from upper to lower octives smoothly but that could just be because I am rusty, and not the flute.
customer_reviews.author: Jenijean Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Beginner Flute
customer_reviews.text: My 12-year-old granddaughter loves her new flute! I would recommend it to anyone as their first flute!
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Kathy

customer_reviews.title: flute
customer_reviews.text: The flute was in the condition as described except a failure to note that all the pads need to be replace, about $80 extra to the total cost.
customer_reviews.author: Morris A. Esmiol III

customer_reviews.title: Product exactly as stated.
customer_reviews.text: The flute arrived in perfect condition. The instrument was exactly as stated in the online description.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie G.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was bought for my grand daughter for high school band and she loves the flute!
customer_reviews.author: stephen commander

customer_reviews.title: My daughter said it was very good, though I saw it was a bit old
customer_reviews.text: My daughter said it was very good, though I saw it was a bit old. But she use it, not me
customer_reviews.author: Xiangqi Mu

customer_reviews.title: After closer inspection
customer_reviews.text: At first glance I was concerned about my purchase of this flute. I had to have some minor repairs done immediately for $55. After the repairs were done, I was told that the flute was very good and worth 3 times what I had spent. I had shipping issues and quality concerns, but I am now a satisfied customer.
customer_reviews.author: AHA

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Broken
customer_reviews.text: It arrived broken and not knowing anything about flutes, i didn't know this. Thought it was my kid playing wrong. Her teacher knew but just told me about it a couple months later. She told us it was broken right when she got it. Horrible as it is too late to return.
customer_reviews.author: GurlyGirl3

customer_reviews.title: Needed $200 repairs
customer_reviews.text: Flute needed $200 worth of repairs when we showed it to the band teacher. Just buy a new one and save yourself a headache.
customer_reviews.author: BIGD1320

product_meta.title: Gemeinhardt Flute (2SP)
product_meta.description: Color:MultiColoredThe 2SP has been a standard and reliable instrument choice for decades and remains the most popular instrument selected by dealers and educators for beginning flutists. With an unprecedented level of quality control including two tiers of professional magnehelic bench testing, the 2SP provides a solid foundation for student musicians to build on.
feature_bullets: Most popular instrument selected by dealers and educators for beginning flutists
A standard and reliable instrument choice
Unprecedented level of quality control including two tiers of professional magnehelic bench testing

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars152 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
